attributes.action: Keep the Indefinite Leave to Remain (ILR) to 5 Years but delay Citizenship.
attributes.additional_details:
To discourage the misuse of public funds and making fake claims of benefits 
.
attributes.background: Keep the ILR to 5 Years and delay the citizenship for further 5 years. After ILR if someone claims benefits for up to 12 months, the citizenship may be delayed for another 3 years, more than 12 months, delayed for another 6 years and more than 24 months, cannot apply for citizenship.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition: 

Keep the 5-year ILR pathway and restrict benefits & citizenship for 5 more years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751490
